forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 73. West wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
